Description: On I-495 at mile marker 43.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-264 at mile marker 21.2 in the City of Virginia Beach, near Lynnhaven Parkway, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
